meta.title: Cal Gallisa - Restaurant in Reus
meta.description: Cal Gallisa, traditional restaurant with history in Reus. Enjoy our local cuisine in a unique setting.

hero.title: Cal Gallisa
hero.subtitle: Tradition and flavor in the heart of Reus since 1950

history.title: Our history
history.paragraph1: Cal Gallisa opened its doors in 1950 as a small family business in the historic center of Reus. The building, dating from the 18th century, has witnessed the history of the city.
history.paragraph2: For over 70 years, we have kept the culinary tradition of the region alive, adapting to new times without losing the essence that characterizes us.
history.paragraph3: Today, Cal Gallisa is a gastronomic reference in Reus, where traditional Catalan cuisine is fused with contemporary touches, always using local products of the highest quality.

spaces.title: Our spaces
spaces.description: Cal Gallisa has two distinct spaces with their own character, each with its particular charm, perfect for different types of celebrations and events.

mercadal.title: Mercadal Room
mercadal.paragraph1: The Mercadal Room is our main space, with an elegant and welcoming decoration that combines traditional elements with modern touches. With capacity for 60 diners, it is ideal for family celebrations, business lunches or any special occasion.
mercadal.paragraph2: This room is characterized by its natural light during the day and its warm and intimate atmosphere at night, thanks to its careful lighting.

features.ideal: Ideal for family celebrations and corporate events
features.access: Access for people with reduced mobility

soterrani.title: Basement Room
soterrani.paragraph1: The Basement Room is a unique space with 18th century stone vaults that offers an intimate and exclusive atmosphere. With capacity for 30 diners, it is perfect for romantic dinners, private meetings or special celebrations in a historic setting.
soterrani.paragraph2: Its exposed stone walls and dim lighting create a magical atmosphere that transports diners to another era, while enjoying our contemporary cuisine.

features.ideal: Ideal for intimate dinners and private meetings
